post:
Long story short, I'll let he image speak for itself.
![](http://talk.lowendspirit.com/uploads/editor/ne/hmktw1idigwm.png "")

You all know what this is about, the BUNDLE deal!!

256mb Bundle : https://clients.mrvm.net/cart.php?a=add&bid=16
Price: $42/year for all 14 locations.

**_FAQ/Product specific terms_**
* NO TOR
* No torrents (directly or via vpn/proxy)
* No crypto currency related activity (That includes wallets)
* TUN/TAP available via the control panel
* FUSE Support
* NFS Support
* Full netfilter support (the usual crap missing from OpenVZ containers)
* 

Extra Special: 
Get 4 or more NAT servers (mix/match between packages) and get **45**% recurring discount.

**Remember to be logged in in WHMCS, otherwise the discount doesn't get applied.**



Servers will be provisioned manually over the weekend.
